text:
The monthly shampoo sales dataset summarizes the monthly sales of shampoo over a three-year
period. You can download the dataset directly from here:
 monthly-shampoo-sales.csv 4
Save the ﬁle with the ﬁlename monthly-shampoo-sales.csv in your current working di-
rectory. We can load this dataset as a Pandas Series using the function read csv() and
summarize the shape of the dataset.
4https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jbrownlee/Datasets/master/shampoo.csv
